abstract: New York’s Human Resources Administration will move into a warehouselike structure at 470 Vanderbilt Avenue in a Brooklyn neighborhood being transformed through gentrification.
snippet: New York’s housing agency will move into a warehouselike structure at 470 Vanderbilt Avenue in a Brooklyn neighborhood being transformed through gentrification.
lead_paragraph: New York’s housing agency will move into a warehouselike structure at 470 Vanderbilt Avenue in a Brooklyn neighborhood being transformed through gentrification.

headline.main: Unconventional Financing Helps Deal for Brooklyn Space

headline.seo: Unconventional Financing Aids Deal for Brooklyn Space
